servinfo.title: Timing Belt and Belt Tensioner Removal and Installation

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Timing Belt and Belt Tensioner Components

item.ptxt: Never turn injection pump pulley counterclockwise. It may cause damage of injection pump.

After timing belt is removed, never turn crankshaft and camshafts independently. If turned, interference may occur between piston and valves and valves themselves, and parts related to piston and valves may be damaged.
Do not bend or twist timing belt.
Do not allow timing belt to come into contact with oil, water, etc. It may be adversely affect belt life.
When replacing a timing belt, be sure to replace timing belt pulley and crankshaft pulley bolt.

s1.ptxt: Remove accessory drive belt referring to Accessory Drive Belt and Idler Pulley Removal and Installation .
Remove timing belt cover No.1 (1) and timing belt cover No.2 (2).
Turn crankshaft pulley clockwise, and stop turning crankshaft pulley immediately before mark (2) of camshaft pulley (3) matches with mark (1) of belt inner cover.
Remove TDC pin cap, and insert special tool (A) into TDC pin hole as shown in figure.
Turn crankshaft pulley clockwise until crankshaft touches special tool (A).
Remove crankshaft pulley as follows.

s2.ptxt: Lock ring gear (2) of flywheel by inserting flat head screw driver (1) or the like into hole of clutch housing.

attention2.ptxt: Never lock flywheel with CKP sensor ring (3). It may cause damage of sensor ring.

attention3.ptxt: For unit disassembly service, lock ring gear of flywheel using special tool (B).

s2.ptxt: Remove special tool (A) from TDC pin hole.
Loosen crankshaft pulley bolt, and remove crankshaft pulley.
Insert special tool (A) into TDC pin hole.
Remove special tool (B) or screw driver or the like.

s1.ptxt: Remove tensioner pulley (1) and timing belt (2).
Remove timing belt tensioner plate (1), if necessary.
Remove crankshaft timing belt pulley (1) using special tools as shown in figure, if necessary.

attention3.ptxt: Be sure to use bolts (2) of M6 size and 1.0 mm (0.039 in.) pitch for fixing crankshaft timing belt pulley by special tools.

s1.ptxt: Confirm that special tool (A) is inserted into TDC pin hole.
If special tool (A) is removed, insert special tool (A) referring to Step 5) of “Installation” under Piston, Piston Ring and Connecting Rod Removal and Installation .
Check crankshaft groove (1) is located in middle of two ribs (2) on gasket holder plate.
Check mark (1) of camshaft pulley (2) is aligned with mark (3) of timing belt inner cover (4).
Install crankshaft timing belt pulley (1), if removed.
Install timing belt tensioner plate (2), if removed.
Install timing belt tensioner pulley (3) with positioning hole (4) to pin (5) of timing belt tensioner plate, and tighten timing belt tensioner pulley nut by hand temporarily.
Install timing belt (1) with aligning its matching lines (2) with matching marks (3) of camshaft pulley (4), injection pump pulley (5) and crankshaft timing belt pulley (6).

attention3.ptxt: Be sure to direct arrow mark (7) of timing belt clockwise as shown in figure.

s1.ptxt: Remove special tool (A) from TDC pin hole.
Adjust timing belt tension as follows.

s2.ptxt: Tighten crankshaft pulley bolt to crankshaft temporarily by hand.
Install adjusting bolt (1) to timing belt tensioner plate, and tighten adjusting bolt and timing belt tensioner pulley nut (2) by hand.

attention3.ptxt: Be sure to use adjusting bolt (1) of M6 size and 1.0 mm (0.039 in.) pitch.

s2.ptxt: Pre-tense timing belt as follows.

s3.ptxt: Fit special tools with torque wrench on crankshaft belt pulley bolt.
Pre-tense timing belt by turning special tools with torque wrench (1) clockwise to 11 N·m (1.1kgf-m, 8.0 lbf-ft) as shown in figure.

s2.ptxt: Measure timing belt tension using special tool as follows.

s3.ptxt: Place sensor (2) of special tool (G) on the center of crankshaft pulley and timing belt tensioner pulley of timing belt.

attention3.ptxt: Be sure to separate sensor (2) from timing belt by specified distance “a”.

spec.title: Distance between timing belt and sensor

s3.ptxt: Measure timing belt tension flipping timing belt by finger as shown in figure.
If timing belt tension is out of specification below, adjust timing belt tension by tightening / loosening adjusting bolt (1) and return to Step c).

spec.title: Timing belt tension (Frequency displayed on special tool):

s2.ptxt: Tighten timing belt tensioner pulley nut (3) to 10 N·m (1.0 kgf-m, 7.5 lbf-ft) temporarily.
Turn crankshaft two revolutions clockwise until mark (1) of camshaft pulley (2) matches with mark (3) of timing belt inner cover (4).
Check that special tool (A) can be inserted into TDC pin hole smoothly.
Remove special tool (A).
Pre-tense timing belt in the same manner as step c).
Measure timing belt tension in the same manner as step d).
If timing belt tension is out of specification below, remove timing belt and return to Step 1).

spec.title: Timing belt tension (Frequency displayed on special tool):

s2.ptxt: Tighten timing belt tensioner pulley nut to specified torque.
Remove adjusting bolt (2).
Turn crankshaft four revolutions clockwise until mark (1) of camshaft pulley (2) matches with mark (3) of timing belt inner cover (4).
Confirm number of timing belt teeth between mark (1) of camshaft pulley (2) and mark (3) of injection pump pulley (4) is 29.
If not, remove timing belt and return to Step 1).

s1.ptxt: Install crankshaft pulley as follows.

s2.ptxt: Lock ring gear in the same manner as Step 6) - a) of “Removal”.
Fit crankshaft pulley (1) to crankshaft.
Tighten new crankshaft pulley bolt (2) as follows.

s3.ptxt: Tighten crankshaft pulley bolt to 40 N·m (4.0 kgf-m, 29.0 lbf-ft).
Retighten crankshaft pulley bolt by turning through 110°.

torqueitem.t-note: Tighten 40 N·m (4.0 kgf-m, 29.0 lbf-ft) and 110° by the specified procedure

s3.ptxt: Remove special tool (B) or screw driver or the like.

s1.ptxt: Apply sealant “A” to thread of TDC pin cap (1), and tighten TDC pin cap as specified torque.
Install timing belt cover No.1 (1) and timing belt cover No.2 (2).
Install accessory drive belt referring to Accessory Drive Belt and Idler Pulley Removal and Installation .
